pr_title: Add option to clear the goto history (fix #8224)

timeline.bodyText: I suggest the wording This will delete all historical waypoints except the last five
timeline.author: bekuno
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1005,6 +1005,8 @@
     <string name="init_longtap_udc">Long tap on map</string>
     <string name="init_summary_longtap_udc">Long tap on map to create a user defined cache</string>
     <string name="goto_targets_list">Internal caches</string>
+    <string name="clear_goto_history_title">Clear goto history</string>
+    <string name="clear_goto_history">This will delete all history waypoints but the last five</string>

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the hint. I changed it to "This will delete all historical waypoints except the five most recent" - should be even clearer.
replies.author: moving-bits

timeline.message: Add option to clear the goto history
Add option to clear the goto history
